thread.title: Still LOVE The Iroquois -
thread.title_full: Still LOVE The Iroquois - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Rosie S
title: Still LOVE The Iroquois -
text: So many good things to say about The Iroquois .. location, cleanliness, quality (friendly and professional) service and 100% comfort. We always look forward to our stay here, as they never miss. The hotel, its staff and amenities offer excellent value. We don't look elsewhere when staying in NY...
